title: Boutique Romance in Hepburn Springs
description: Experience a tranquil escape in Victoria’s spa country with a two-night midweek (Sunday to Thursday) stay at The Dudley Boutique Hotel in the picturesque Daylesford area. Includes lavish daily breakfasts, a bottle of French champagne, chocolates and a late checkout.

title: Idyllic Peppers Hepburn Springs Countryside Escape with Onsite Mineral Day Spa & Daily Breakfast
description:
Victoria’s spa country is calling you for a cosy mini-break at the chic yet rustic Peppers Mineral Springs Hotel, nestled in the beautiful town of Hepburn Springs. This historic 1930s retreat is the definition of luxury, with the onsite Mineral Spa forging a wellness haven that slots perfectly into the tranquil landscape, providing soothing treatments and rejuvenating bathing experiences. Follow your therapeutic spa day with a stroll through the enchanting Italian-inspired gardens, manicured to perfection with a picturesque miniature hedge maze in the centre. Complete your day of indulgence with a sensational meal at The Argus Dining Room, showcasing the freshest market-to-plate style of dining paired perfectly with a drop of local wine.

From the moment you enter the grounds of this charming country estate, you will feel completely immersed in the romance of the region. The Hepburn and Daylesford region is the dream destination for a relaxing holiday, with an abundance of historic countryside charm, wineries and fine dining destinations peppered throughout the village - you'll never want to leave.
offer_address: 124 Main Road, Hepburn Springs 3461, Victoria, Australia

title: Relaxing Getaway to the Mineral Springs Capital of Australia
description: Treat yourself to a relaxing retreat in Australia’s spa capital. Bellinzona Resort is perfectly located between Hepburn Springs and Daylesford, home to the country’s largest concentration of mineral springs. At Bellinzona Resort, you can relax surrounded by lush gardens, a fabulous restaurant and cellar door, perfect for a romantic retreat or a girls' weekend. If you want a really special escape, why not spoil mum with a Mother's Day getaway? Includes daily buffet breakfast, one entrée each at The Heritage Restaurant, two drinks vouchers and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

title: Relaxing Countryside Escape in Australia's Spa Capital
description:
Treat yourself to a relaxing retreat in Australia’s spa capital at Bellinzona Resort in Hepburn Springs, home to the country's largest concentration of mineral springs. Relax, surrounded by lush gardens and a fabulous restaurant - perfect for a romantic retreat or a minibreak with friends.

Sneak away to a place where the hills are greener, the pubs are cosier and the spas are better and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, one entrée each at Heritage Restaurant, one glass of wine per person and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.
